PERSONA:
meet james, a 54-year-old african american man living in a metropolitan area in the midwest region of the united states. he has completed some college education and holds an associate's degree. james was born and raised in the u.s. and is a citizen.

although james identifies as a liberal democrat, he seldom attends religious services despite being a born-again or evangelical protestant christian. he is currently living with his partner, and their combined family income is less than $30,000, placing them in the lower-income tier.

james is an avid internet user, accessing it several times a day. however, he does not currently engage in any voluntary work or community service activities. he is a registered voter and is absolutely certain about his registration status at his current address.

despite facing financial challenges, james remains optimistic about his future and is actively exploring ways to improve his circumstances. he values education and hopes to further his studies when his financial situation permits. in his free time, james enjoys exploring the cultural offerings of his metropolitan area, visiting museums, and attending local community events.
